name: Twice Baked Sweet Potatoes
description: These might be a little fussy for Thanksgiving when you've got a table full of side dishes but try them next time you roast a chicken....
recipeIngredient: 6 very small sweet potatoes (about 2 cups of potato flesh)
Choose some of the following add ins:
Butter, mascarpone, heavy cream or cream cheese.
Cinnamon, nutmeg, ginger, allspice, pumpkin pie spice, a few drops vanilla, orange zest.
Condensed milk, brown sugar, maple syrup, honey, or agave nectar.
Savory additions: Crumbled bacon, small bit of chipotle, leftover pulled pork, jack cheese.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake once, mix in ingredients and bake a second time. Given my sweets were very small, they only required about 15 minutes in the oven for the second baking.
